strings:
<voice_0x01000C5D><se_low>King Trode: Argh!
That despicable abbey!
What a hideous affair!

<voice_0x01000C5E><se_low>King Trode: It was bad enough being turned into a monster, but that's the first time I've been threatened
with torture!

<voice_0x01000C5F><se_low>King Trode: It's a disgrace! I'm a king! A great ruler!
Just thinking about it makes my blood boil!
<voice_0x01000C60><se_low>Yangus: Looks like Grandad's 'avin' a bad day, eh.

<voice_0x01000C61><se_low>Yangus: Not that I blame 'im.
Wot 'e needs is a drink down the pub.
That'll sort 'im out.
<voice_0x01000C62><se_low>Yangus: Only...'ow the 'ell are we gonna get 'im into a town lookin' like that, eh?

<voice_0x01000C64><se_low>Yangus: Here, guv! The town I used to live in is
down in the south o' this cont'nent.
How about we 'ead off down there, eh?

<voice_0x01000C65><se_low>Yangus: Sure, Pickham ain't no rose garden, but it's in
the middle o' nowhere, right. Even a strange
old geezer like 'im would fit in no problem.
<voice_0x01000C66><se_low>Yangus: Old Grandad 'ere 'll be able to getta drink!
<voice_0x01000C67><se_low>Yangus: There's a mate o' mine there who knows ev'ryfin' about ev'ryfin'. We calls 'im Brains. He'll know the story on Dhoulmagus.

<voice_0x01000C68><se_low>Yangus: See, two birds wiv one stone, eh!
I ain't just a pretty face! Come on, let's get goin'! Back to me bandit roots!
